Sentencas: The performance of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-delta perovskite systems in applications such as solid oxide fuel cells and catalysis is related to the proportion of substitution atoms.
Titulo: Theoretical study of the optical and thermodynamic properties of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-δ (x/y=0.25, 0.5, 0.75) perovskites

Sentencas: Using a density functional theory method, we investigate the doping effect on the electronic, optical, and thermodynamic properties of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-delta (x/y = 0.25, 0.5, 0.75).
Titulo: Theoretical study of the optical and thermodynamic properties of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-δ (x/y=0.25, 0.5, 0.75) perovskites

Sentencas: Our results show that La doping introduces an empty state and pushes the Fermi level upwards.
Titulo: Theoretical study of the optical and thermodynamic properties of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-δ (x/y=0.25, 0.5, 0.75) perovskites

Sentencas: The doping Fe derived states locate away from the Fermi level as compared with Co states.
Titulo: Theoretical study of the optical and thermodynamic properties of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-δ (x/y=0.25, 0.5, 0.75) perovskites

Sentencas: From the results of optical absorption, the peak at 200-300 nm is enhanced and experiences a blue-shift with increasing La concentration.
Titulo: Theoretical study of the optical and thermodynamic properties of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-δ (x/y=0.25, 0.5, 0.75) perovskites

Sentencas: The corresponding peak at 400-700 nm also shows a blue-shift induced by both La and Fe doping, and it could be enhanced by Fe doping while being suppressed by La doping.
Titulo: Theoretical study of the optical and thermodynamic properties of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-δ (x/y=0.25, 0.5, 0.75) perovskites

Sentencas: And the peak above 1500 nm is enhanced by the cooperation of La and Fe doping.
Titulo: Theoretical study of the optical and thermodynamic properties of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-δ (x/y=0.25, 0.5, 0.75) perovskites

Sentencas: From thermodynamic calculations via an Ellingham diagram, it is found that the parent SrCoO3 is the most favorable composition for releasing O-2, with both La and Fe doping hampering the reduction reaction.
Titulo: Theoretical study of the optical and thermodynamic properties of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-δ (x/y=0.25, 0.5, 0.75) perovskites

Sentencas: Therefore, the optical and thermodynamic properties of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-delta could be adjusted by special doping values.
Titulo: Theoretical study of the optical and thermodynamic properties of LaxSr1-xCo1-yFeyO3-δ (x/y=0.25, 0.5, 0.75) perovskites
